mapper.select: select orderDetail.id as id,orderDetail.orderId as orderId,orderDetail.skuId as skuId, orderDetail.num as num,orderDetail.price as price,orderDetail.totalPrice as totalPrice, goods.name as name,t.provalue as provalue,t.proname as proname,user.name as detail_name from t_order_detail as orderDetail left join t_goods_sku as sku on orderDetail.skuid = sku.id left join t_goods as goods on goods.id = sku.goodsid left join t_order as torder on orderDetail.orderid = torder.id left join t_user as user on torder.userid = user.id left join (select proval.skuid as skuid,group_concat(pro.name) as proname, GROUP_CONCAT(proval.value SEPARATOR '|#$%|') as provalue from t_goods_pro_val as proVal left join t_goods_pro as pro on pro.id = proVal.proid group by proval.skuid) as t on t.skuid = sku.id where orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_order_detail (orderId, skuId, num, price, totalprice) values

mapper.select: select t_order_detail.*, t_order.ordertime from t_order_detail left join t_order on t_order_detail.orderid = t_order.id where t_order_detail.skuid in (${ids}) and t_order.state = 1
select t_order_detail.* from t_order_detail left join t_order on t_order_detail.orderid = t_order.id where t_order.ordernum = #{ordercode}
